DOC.brief_summary: A two armed randomized trial is evaluating the effect of the medical-student-delivered school-based intervention Education Against Tobacco on the smoking behavior of adolescents in 7-11th grade of secondary schools in Bosnia and Herzegovina. The primary endpoint is the change in smoking prevalence between the two groups.
DOC.brief_title: Education Against Tobacco Randomized Trial in Bosnia and Herzegovina
DOC.criteria: Visiting grades 79 of regular secondary schools in Bosnia and Herzegovina. Not fulfilling inclusion criteria.
